Description: IBANEZ Les Paul LAWSUIT 2350 Electric Guitar Black Japan 1977 w case Here is a beautiful IBANEZ Custom Super 70's Electric guitar aka: Les Paul "Lawsuit" Guitar Les Paul body design Model: 2350. Serial #: C771658 Made in Japan It is a shiny solid black lacquer finish with white inlay edging The white inlay has yellowed slightly from age Mother of pearl inlay on the frets and original Ibanez headstock logo design 6 string All tuner knobs move smoothly. This guitar is highly rated from testimonies I see on the internet. It has gold tone tuning pegs & hardware. It appears to be in excellent condition. Minimal wear for a pre-owned guitar EXCEPT: ~ a long line/crack on the front near the rhythm toggle - may just be in the lacquer (see pix 5) ~ there is a small crack/chip on the back (see pix 11) ~ some minor scuff on back (see pix 12) Comes with the original hard case - lined with faux lambswool Will be shipped securely in a bicycle box. All questions are welcome. Shipping: Buyer pays all shipping & handling costs. Will ship immediately upon receipt payment through Paypal. Payment: Payment must be received within 1 week from the end of the auction. DO NOT DUPLICATE OR COPY!
